verses.verse: And this is the <S%H1293>blessing<s%>, with which <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H4194>death<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> from <S%H5514>Sinai<s%>, and rose <S%H2224>up<s%> from <S%H8165>Seir<s%> unto <S%H3313>them<s%>; he shined forth from <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H6290>Paran<s%>, and he <S%H857>came<s%> with ten <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H6944>saints<s%>: from his right <S%H3225>hand<s%> went a <S%H799>fiery<s%> law for <S%H1881>them<s%>.

<S%H637>Yes<s%>, he <S%H2245>loved<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>; all his <S%H6918>saints<s%> are in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>: and they sat <S%H8497>down<s%> at your <S%H7272>feet<s%>; every one shall <S%H5375>receive<s%> of your <S%H1703>words<s%>.
<S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> us a <S%H8451>law<s%>, even the <S%H4181>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H6952>congregation<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

And he was <S%H4428>king<s%> in <S%H3484>Jeshurun<s%>, when the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> and the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>.
Let <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>, and not <S%H4191>die<s%>; and let not his <S%H4962>men<s%> be <S%H4557>few<s%>.

And this is the blessing of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8085>Hear<s%>, <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> him unto his <S%H5971>people<s%>: let his <S%H3027>hands<s%> be <S%H7227>sufficient<s%> for <S%H5828>him<s%>; and be you an help to him from his <S%H6862>enemies<s%>.

And of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, Let your <S%H8550>Thummim<s%> and your <S%H224>Urim<s%> be with your <S%H2623>holy<s%> <S%H376>one<s%>, whom you did <S%H5254>prove<s%> at <S%H4532>Massah<s%>, and with whom you did <S%H7378>argue<s%> at the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah<s%>;

Who <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H1>father<s%> and to his <S%H517>mother<s%>, I have not <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H5234>him<s%>; neither did he acknowledge his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, nor <S%H3045>knew<s%> his own <S%H1121>sons<s%>: for they have <S%H8104>observed<s%> your <S%H565>word<s%>, and <S%H5341>kept<s%> your <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

They shall <S%H3384>teach<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> your <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> your <S%H8451>law<s%>: they shall <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H6988>incense<s%> <S%H639>before<s%> <S%H3632>you<s%>, and whole burnt sacrifice upon your <S%H4196>altar<s%>.

<S%H1288>Bless<s%>, <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, his <S%H2428>substance<s%>, and <S%H7521>accept<s%> the <S%H6467>work<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands<s%>: <S%H4272>strike<s%> through the <S%H4975>body<s%> of them that <S%H6965>rise<s%> against <S%H8130>him<s%>, and of them that hate <S%H6965>him<s%>, that they rise <S%H4480>not<s%> <S%H6965>again<s%>.

And of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, The <S%H3039>beloved<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H7931>live<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%> by <S%H2653>him<s%>; and the Lord shall cover him all the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7931>long<s%>, and he shall live between his <S%H3802>shoulders<s%>.

And of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> be his <S%H776>land<s%>, for the precious <S%H4022>things<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, for the <S%H2919>dew<s%>, and for the <S%H8415>deep<s%> that couches <S%H7257>beneath<s%>,
And for the <S%H4022>precious<s%> <S%H8393>fruits<s%> brought forth by the <S%H8121>sun<s%>, and for the precious <S%H4022>things<s%> put <S%H1645>forth<s%> by the <S%H3391>moon<s%>,
And for the chief <S%H7218>things<s%> of the <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H2042>mountains<s%>, and for the precious <S%H4022>things<s%> of the <S%H5769>lasting<s%> <S%H1389>hills<s%>,

And for the precious <S%H4022>things<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> and <S%H4393>fullness<s%> <S%H7522>there<s%>, and for the good will of him that <S%H7931>lived<s%> in the <S%H5572>bush<s%>: let the blessing <S%H935>come<s%> upon the <S%H7218>head<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, and upon the top of the <S%H6936>head<s%> of him that was <S%H5139>separated<s%> from his <S%H251>brothers<s%>.

His <S%H1926>glory<s%> is like the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of his <S%H7794>bullock<s%>, and his <S%H7161>horns<s%> are like the <S%H7161>horns<s%> of <S%H7214>unicorns<s%>: with them he shall <S%H5055>push<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> to the <S%H657>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>: and they are the ten <S%H7233>thousands<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and they are the <S%H505>thousands<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%>.
And of <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H8055>Rejoice<s%>, <S%H2074>Zebulun<s%>, in your going <S%H3318>out<s%>; <S%H3485>and<s%>, Issachar, in your <S%H168>tents<s%>.

They shall <S%H7121>call<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> unto the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>; there they shall <S%H2076>offer<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>: for they shall <S%H3243>suck<s%> of the <S%H8228>abundance<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, and of <S%H8226>treasures<s%> <S%H2934>hid<s%> in the <S%H2344>sand<s%>.

And of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be he that <S%H7337>enlarges<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%>: he <S%H7931>dwells<s%> as a <S%H3833>lion<s%>, and <S%H2963>tears<s%> the <S%H2220>arm<s%> <S%H637>with<s%> the crown of the <S%H6936>head<s%>.

And he <S%H7200>provided<s%> the first <S%H7225>part<s%> for <S%H2513>himself<s%>, because there, in a portion of the <S%H2710>lawgiver<s%>, was he <S%H5603>seated<s%>; and he <S%H857>came<s%> with the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%>, he <S%H6213>executed<s%> the <S%H6666>justice<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, and his <S%H4941>judgments<s%> with <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.
And of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H1835>Dan<s%> is a <S%H738>lion<s%>'s <S%H1482>whelp<s%>: he shall <S%H2187>leap<s%> from <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>.

And of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%>, <S%H7649>satisfied<s%> with <S%H7522>favor<s%>, and <S%H4392>full<s%> with the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: <S%H3423>possess<s%> you the <S%H3220>west<s%> and the <S%H1864>south<s%>.

And of <S%H836>Asher<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, Let <S%H836>Asher<s%> be <S%H1288>blessed<s%> with <S%H1121>sons<s%>; let him be <S%H7521>acceptable<s%> to his <S%H251>brothers<s%>, and let him <S%H2881>dip<s%> his <S%H7272>foot<s%> in <S%H8081>oil<s%>.
Your <S%H4515>shoes<s%> shall be <S%H1270>iron<s%> and <S%H5178>brass<s%>; and as your <S%H3117>days<s%>, so shall your strength <S%H1679>be<s%>.

There is none like unto the <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H3484>Jeshurun<s%>, who <S%H7392>rides<s%> upon the <S%H8064>heaven<s%> in your <S%H5828>help<s%>, and in his <S%H1346>excellency<s%> on the <S%H7834>sky<s%>.

The <S%H6924>eternal<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is your <S%H4585>refuge<s%>, and underneath are the <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2220>arms<s%>: and he shall thrust <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H559>you<s%>; and shall say, Destroy <S%H8045>them<s%>.

<S%H3478>Israel<s%> then shall <S%H7931>live<s%> in <S%H983>safety<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%>: the <S%H5869>fountain<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> shall be upon a <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1715>corn<s%> and <S%H8492>wine<s%>; also his <S%H8064>heavens<s%> shall drop <S%H6201>down<s%> <S%H2919>dew<s%>.

<S%H835>Happy<s%> are <S%H3478>you<s%>, O Israel: who is like unto <S%H5971>you<s%>, O people <S%H3467>saved<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, the <S%H4043>shield<s%> of your <S%H5828>help<s%>, and who is the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of your <S%H1346>excellency<s%>! and your <S%H341>enemies<s%> shall be found <S%H3584>liars<s%> unto <S%H1869>you<s%>; and you shall tread upon their high <S%H1116>places<s%>.
